boat.full_description: Built to satisfy a desire for a family dinghy, but not really used as such. Sailed on the Thames, the Solent and the Orwell. The rig gives lots of options and performs well in windy conditions with just jib and mizzen. She comes complete with trailer, oars, bouyancy bags, sails, anchors and lines. I also have an epropulsion Spirit 1 electric outboard available separately for £1200 extra
boat.name: Pegbox
boat.short_description: Home built Iain Oughtred Penny Fee design with an added jib and bowsprit as per the designer's suggestion
